entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero except minus 5 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero except minus 5 inland. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
